### Writing Help
The following sources document some key parts where generative AI was used in co-authorship. Other parts of this site might also be supported with AI, but only as a tool to formulate or expand the author's original thoughts.
* [ChatGPT · Title finding](https://chat.openai.com/share/11bed6ad-e575-4b5c-a4ed-7855d96ab6b7)
